attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: This is literally the worst app I have ever downloaded it glitches too much and doesn’t let me press anything and it took 3 days to download

attributes.title: Not good
attributes.review: I normally like to eat Cheetos with my avocado toast in the mornings however this app has changed my view of them all together. This app misrepresents all Cheetos of this world so don’t waste your time.

attributes.title: Why bother!!!
attributes.review: The app wouldn’t load no matter what I tried. If it did, it crashed within seconds. I restarted the app and my phone countless times. Absolute trash!!!!

attributes.title: brittney
attributes.review: ‼️⚠️ATTENTION⚠️‼️ i downloaded this app and then it deleted all my data on my phone !!!!! i tried calling the apple company to get my data back but they said they couldnt do anything 😖.

attributes.title: I’m as unsatisfied as poor malania
attributes.review: This app, should be deleted. Point. Blank. Period Pooh. Very disappointed in the creativity and overall vibe of this app. Did not pass the vibe check. Do better.

attributes.title: Horrible APP
attributes.review: Nothing else to say but take trump out of office 2020 hahahahah. He wants to delete tik tok well we will delete his app and then we will see how he likes it. Then he can really get a taste of his own medicine. 😈😈😈

attributes.title: Disgusting.
attributes.review: As SOON as I open this app I was called so many slurs? I was called the d slur and the f slur, this is completely inappropriate and I expected better from the president. If I could give it 0 stars I would.

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: Omg lemme start off with the app having terrible nudity and it is so disgusting. Why would the worst president of the united states have his own app. ✨ D I S G U S T I N G✨ chile anyways so 👁👄👁 i would definitely download an obama app🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰 PRESIDENT OBAMA SWEETY FOR LIFEEEEE. imagine being the most hated president in the world 🥰😍✨

attributes.title: No I did but are have yes.
attributes.review: So basically, I just thought maybe back when I did because it would did, but trump, you are have stupid.🥰😘

attributes.title: Don’t get the app. 1 star
attributes.review: The app gave my phone a virus. I saw naked people. And a 57 year old man asked for my number. It didn’t just give my phone 1 virus no it gave it 5. Took 9 days to download
